name: Coil Characterization
command-line: if ! test "$(basename [COIL] .txt)" = "$(head -1 [COIL])"; then echo "Invalid coil input: name mismatch"; exit 1; fi && if test "$(basename [COMPARISON])" != comparison; then ln -sfT [COMPARISON] comparison; fi && echo "before exec:" && ls -l comparison/ && touch _start && caract_inside.sh [COIL] [FANTOM] [DATA] && echo "after exec:" && ls -l comparison/ reportFile/ && OUTPUTS="$(find comparison/ -newer _start -name [OUTPUT_MAT]) $(find reportFile/ -newer _start -name [OUTPUT_PDF])" && echo "found outputs: $OUTPUTS" && cp $OUTPUTS ./

inputs.name: Coil
inputs.description: Txt file containing the coil description with one item per line (e.g. 31P_surf)

inputs.name: Phantom
inputs.description: Txt file containing the coil description with one item per line (e.g. 1.25g NiSO4 x 6H2O, 5g NaCl /litre d eau)

inputs.name: Data
inputs.description: Tarball containing all data images to be processed

inputs.name: Comparison
inputs.description: Comparison directory containing mat files from previous executions. Please set "Results directory" above to the same value, to allow future reuse of the mat file that this execution will produce.
